definition[0]: the 13th letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the number 1,000 in the system of roman numerals
definition[2]: the written abbreviation of  metre or  metres
definition[3]: the written abbreviation of  mile or  miles
definition[4]: the written abbreviation of medium, used on clothes to mean an average size
definition[5]: written abbreviation for METRE(S); MILE(S); MILLION
